title: intro
text: vignette introduces transcribe package. package provides R interface transcribe audio using Whisper, optional post‐processing via Ollama.

title: intro
code: # Install from GitHub (if not on CRAN yet) # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("YourUserName/transcribe")

title: intro
text: minimal example showing transcribe audio file:
code: # library(transcribe) # Uncomment once your package is installed # transcript <- transcribe_audio( #   input_path = "path/to/audio.wav", #   language = "en", #   whisper_model_name = "large-v3-turbo", #   processed = TRUE, #   ollama_model = "llama3.2" # ) # cat(transcript)

title: intro
text: can serve web interface via plumber: Open browser http://127.0.0.1:port see interface.

title: intro
text: vignette covered basics installing using transcribe audio transcription. See README additional vignettes details.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Last F (2025). transcribe: Package (One Line, Title Case). R package version 0.0.0.9001, https://brancengregory.github.io/transcribe/.

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: transcribe package provides R interface audio transcription using Whisper, optional post‐processing via Ollama. also includes sample plumber API web interface.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
code: library(transcribe)  # Transcribe a local audio file transcript <- transcribe_audio(   input_path = "path/to/audio.wav",   language = "en",   whisper_model_name = "large-v3-turbo",   processed = TRUE,   ollama_model = "llama3.2" ) cat(transcript)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: package includes sample plumber API inst/plumber/api.R. run : open browser http://127.0.0.1:7608 see web interface uploading specifying URL transcription.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

what: Allowed Whisper models for transcription. — allowed_whisper_models
